sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-main align="center" justify="center">
        <v-container fluid fill-height align="center" justify="center">
            <v-row align="center" justify="center" class="mt-10">
                <v-col cols="12" md="4" align="center" justify="center">
                    <v-card class="elevation-12" align="center" justify="center">
                        <v-toolbar dark color="primary">
                            <v-toolbar-title class="text-h5"> {{ !this.reg ? 'Login' : 'Register' }} </v-toolbar-title>
                        </v-toolbar>
                        <v-card-text>
                            <v-form @submit.prevent="login">
                                <v-text-field v-if="reg" label="Username" v-model="username" type="text" :rules="nameRules"
                                    required></v-text-field>
                                <v-text-field label="Email" v-model="email" type="email" :rules="emailRules"
                                    required></v-text-field>
                                <v-text-field label="HasÅ‚o" v-model="password" type="password" :rules="passwordRules"
                                    required></v-text-field>
                            </v-form>
                        </v-card-text>
                        <v-card-actions>
                            <v-btn color="primary" to="/">Home</v-btn>
                            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                            <v-btn color="primary" @click="() => { this.reg = !this.reg }"> {{ this.reg ? 'Login' : 'Register'
                            }} </v-btn>
                            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                            <v-btn color="primary" :disabled="valid()" @click="login">Next</v-btn>
                        </v-card-actions>
                    </v-card>
                </v-col>
            </v-row>
        </v-container>
    </v-main>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'ShowLogin',
    data() {
        return {
            reg: false,
            username: "",
            nameRules: [
                (v) => !!v || "Username is required",
                (v) => /^[a-zA-Z]{3,15}$/i.test(v) || "Username length must be correct",
            ],
            email: "",
            emailRules: [
                (v) => !!v || "Email is required",
                (v) => /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/i.test(v) || "Email must be correct"
            ],
            password: "",
            passwordRules: [
                (v) => !!v || "Password is required",
                (v) => /^[a-zA-Z]{8,100}$/i.test(v) || "Password length must be correct",
            ],
            valid: false
        };
    },
    methods: {
        login() {
            // TODO logowanie
            console.log("Logowanie...");
        },
        register() {
            // TODO rejestrowanie
            console.log("Rejestrowanie...");
        }
    },
    computed: {
        // && (this.reg ? this.username : true)
        valid: this.password && this.email
    },
};
</script>
